overview: 2008 13+ Zale Mokale Aakash is a Marathi drama. Neha (Pallavi Vaidya) and Samir (Subodh Bhave) find out that their adopted child has special needs. Samir is unable to handle the situation and takes some rash decisions. Complications arise with the arrival of the child's biological mother.
title: Zhale Mokale Aakash
